name: The Descent (itch) (Midnight Link Studio)
description:
The Descent is a 3D third-person platform game, in which you as Self, need to explore the environment and go deep in the abysm, an ancient sacred place that tests who try to adventure inside of it and give a giant power. 

This game is in active development, may contain bugs.

PC keybinds:

  • W/A/S/D - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interactions
  • Mouse - Aim

Game Developers

  • Alexandre Teixeira Dellalo - Sound Design
  • Arthur Neves Lorando - 3D Environment Artist / Level Design / Game Design
  • Diego Garcia Gonçalves - Animator
  • Felipe Ferreira -  Sound Design 
  • Lucas Moreira da Costa Fernandes - Programmer / Game Design
  • Paulo Henrique Naccarato Fiuza - Sound Design / FMOD
  • Raí Esteves Silva - 3D Character Artist / 2D Artist
  • Reinaldo Barbosa Di Pietro - 3D Environment Artist
